mapper.insert: insert into PUB_KDTD (DJH, JJRBM, DYRQ, KDDH, SCRQ, JJRXM, JJRDH, SJRDZ, DWMC, BGDH, ZZDH, YDDH, SJRXM, AH, KDID, DSRBH, FYDZ, YYSDBH, SDYBH) values (#{djh},#{jjrbm},#{dyrq},#{kddh},#{scrq},#{jjrxm},#{jjrdh},#{sjrdz},#{dwmc},#{bgdh},#{zzdh},#{yddh},#{sjrxm},#{ah},#{kdid},#{dsrbh},#{fydz},#{yysdbh},#{sdybh})
